reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Videos play smoothly, pages load quick, search is instant and downloads are fast. Great job. Needs smooth scrolling on big pages but it isn\'t terrible.
reviews.author: David Millard

reviews.title: Superb app!!!
reviews.comment: Really good app for browsing any site. Making my time useful. Lovable and handy app <3
reviews.author: Ananiya Caris

reviews.title: Superb browser
reviews.comment: Fast,fluid and smooth browser. Web pages loads pretty fast and smooth. I really liked the night mode, which helps u read pages in dark environment without staining the eyes. Overall a good browser with loads of features.
reviews.author: poornaprakash S

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: Every browser says that they\'re fast, but this one blew me away. The UI is also terrific. Surprised and pleased that such a nice browser exists on the market

reviews.title: Fast
reviews.comment: I havent downloaded a more useful app, fast and the tools are handy and easy to use. Theres only one problem, the videos wont open when i try the app restarts but i guess that just happens to me.

reviews.comment: Amazing except for the fact that it autofills words and you cannot back space. Wrote to them twice without a response. Don\'t get this until the problem is fixed.

reviews.title: I can\'t download files
reviews.comment: I can browse web pages but I can\'t download files. Each time I try to download a file it never starts reading the amount of bytes downloaded. After awhile it pops a message asking me to check my network.
